catalog_info.title: "Beginnings": Prefaces and Exordiums in Classical Persian Literature
catalog_info.prereq: Recommended: At least two years of Persian or equivalent.
catalog_info.description: Readings from major Persian poetic and prose works from the 10th to the 15th century, with a focus on prefaces and exordiums. Spanning across genres, from epic, lyric and narrative verse to didactic andarz, scientific treatise and historiography, the course will explore the various possible openings of classical Persian texts and survey the functions and techniques of literary thresholds.
